General.Name: Dnake Xiamen Intelligent Technology
General.Description: Dnake (Xiamen) Intelligent Technology Co., Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells video intercom products and smart community systems to the customers worldwide. It offers a range of intercom products, such as SIP and android video door phone, analogue video door phone, smart home product, and wireless video doorbell. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Xiamen, the People's Republic of China.
